episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1101_0100:
A ball-rolling race was being held in the
Pasio mountains.
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_0300:
Looks like a bunch of others brought
Rellor, too.
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_0400:
When it comes to rolling balls, I guess Rellor
comes to mind!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_0301_0500: What kind of Pokémon is it?
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_0401_0600: It’s known as the Rolling Pokémon!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_0402_0800:
Yup! My Rellor and I met in the Paldean
desert.
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_0900:
Rellor creates a mud ball by mixing sand
and dirt with psychic energy, then it rolls it
around.
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1000:
Florian told me the rolling matures the
energy it needs for Evolution!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1100:
Oho! Is that so? You sure know a lot,
young lady!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1300:
I’m Teddy, a hiker! I recently formed a
sync pair with Rellor.
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1400: Oh? Looking at your Rellor, is it...
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1600: Apparently, my Rellor is a different color!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1700: He looks so strong with his golden mud ball!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1800:
I’m actually looking for a teammate to battle
alongside.
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_1900:
Interested in teaming up and teaching me
more about Rellor?
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_0301_2000:
I want to know how strong your bond
is first!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_0402_2300:
I see. You want to know how strong our
bond is!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4001_1001_2400:
Then Rellor and I will show you in the
ball-rolling race!
episode_event_nugget_2025/6801_1001_0100:
It feels so good to reach the top with a
heavy pack!
episode_event_nugget_2025/6801_1001_0200:
But when it’s time to head back down,
my pack a little lighter, I feel sad.
episode_event_nugget_2025/6801_1001_0300:
But that reluctance to leave is part of what
makes hiking special!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1101_0100:
The ball-rolling race ended, and
[Name:PlayerNickname ] beat Teddy!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1001_0200:
Ga ha ha! You’re tough to beat,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1001_0400:
Huh? You thought Rellor and I were
good, too?
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1001_0500:
So you want to join me in battle, I take it?
Thanks! I appreciate it!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1001_0600:
And I’ll teach you everything I know about
Rellor!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1001_0700: Great! I’ll be counting on ya!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4002_1001_0800:
Together, let’s climb this mountain of sync
pairs—and reach the summit!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4003_1001_0200:
Here—take this, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Consider it a trophy for winning!
episode_event_nugget_2025/4003_1001_0300: Take care of it, will you?
episode_event_nugget_2025/4003_1001_0400: It’s worth more than a nugget of my wisdom!
